name: color_stream_original
description: Color_stream (Video 720x480 - 2011) is part of a research where I set out to think of the act of painting using other mediums besides paint it self. From melted wax to distorting pixels, mixing light at pigment to exploring glitches in videos, I search for some aspect of the visual feeling of painting and expanding it to a hole range of different medias.  https://renato.hotglue.me/?artes+visuais @PerottoRenato
